shinyplus 0.0.1
  • Reference

shinyplus

A Shiny App to Automate Grocery Shopping at PLUS.nl

  1. Create an account at https://www.plus.nl
  2. Select your local PLUS store in your account
  3. Save your email address and password to a .yaml file and set its location with options(plus_credentials = "your_file.yaml")
  4. Run shinyplus::open_app() to open the app

Installation

You can install the development version of shinyplus like so:

remotes::install_github("weberends/shinyplus")

Disclaimer:

This open-source R package, shinyplus, is independently developed and has no affiliation with, endorsement by, or association with PLUS Retail B.V. or the website plus.nl.

The package uses client-side browser automation via the chromote package to interact with publicly available content on plus.nl, simulating user behaviour (such as logging in, browsing, and selecting products) in a private, ephemeral browser session. The package does not store, scrape, or redistribute any proprietary product data, images, or assets from PLUS. Any icons or images used (e.g. the PLUS logo) are sourced from Wikipedia under appropriate free-use licensing. All trademarks, product names, and brand assets remain the property of their respective owners.
